one_reviews_text: I am a new VR user and I was looking for a fun experience. I got this app and It took me a little while to find out the controls. But I learned that I supposed to finish all tasks at the first level to unlock the new level. I was amazed by the mountain house level and I had a great experience shopping in a breathtaking location from the comfort of my home. I especially loved the shoes and handbags collections!

review_feedback:
Hello, we are sorry you have had an issue. We suspect that your device may not be the Rift. We are are happy to issue your refund. You will need to request it first through Oculus.
/////////
To request using the Oculus companion app on your phone:

Open the Oculus companion app on your phone.
Tap Settings from the bottom menu.
Tap Purchase History under Payment.
Tap on the content you want to request a refund for, then tap Request Refund.
Follow the on-screen instructions to request your refund.
/////////
If you are still having issues, please contact us directly at support@modogma.com. Take care.

one_reviews_text: This app reminded me of minority report. cool realistic graphics. to me this is what online shopping should be like. not looking at some 2D pictures. using VR for shopping make it very different
